name: Furious Brawler
description: I will say it now rather than later. This is a warship, and I intend to take it into danger. If anyone has objections, speak now or forever hold your peace and get off my ship.
author: Himichi Thackery, Captain of the KFS Almayer, before embarking to Nutria.

name: Incessant Gunnery Drills
description: Try shooting that badly again and I'll have you be the next target dummy.
author: Ratting Johnson, Krysan Federal Reserve
